医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
食源性疾病爆发爆发的背后是什么？ CDC发现关键风险和修复美国的细菌粮食生存暴发增加，而2014年至2022年之间的病毒暴发下降，环境污染作为主要原因。该研究强调了如何改善卫生能够减少病毒传播，但由于食物处理和温度不当而表现出持续的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/whate28099s-behind-behind-the-rise-in-rise-in--in-forede-illense-illness-creaste ure爆发c-cdc-uncovers-uncovers-key-key-kekey-key-strisks-＆fixes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/whate28099s-behind-behind-the-phind-the-rise-in-food-borne-illness-illness-creaste uck-cdc-uncovers-uncovers-key-isks-risks-risks-and-fixes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=D0BA7545-279A-4F04-4F04-8A5E-01FB3612113D Thu, 13 Mar 2025 21:13:00 -0400 What’s behind the rise in foodborne illness outbreaks? CDC uncovers key risks and fixes
研究表明，自闭症与自闭症相关的饮食如何导致严重的维生素缺乏症由于极端的食物选择性，自闭症谱系障碍（ASD）的儿童面临多种微量营养素缺陷的高风险，尤其是维生素A，D，B12和钙。这些缺陷可能导致严重的健康问题，例如身体体重正常的儿童，例如rike，视力丧失和免疫功能障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/study-shows-how-autism--------------------------投项目投入投入投入物https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/study-shows-how-autism------------------------投项目参差不齐 - vitamin-deficiencies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=311f98bd-bf55-4bf7-bf7-bf7-b1bb-5e56ffba2dbb Thu, 13 Mar 2025 20:40:00 -0400 Study shows how autism-linked picky eating causes serious vitamin deficiencies
科学家揭示了爱泼斯坦 - 巴尔病毒重新激活如何触发儿童的MIS-C科学家表明，由TGFβ诱导的免疫抑制作用驱动的Epstein-Barr病毒（EBV）是儿童多系统炎症综合征（MIS-C）的关键驱动因素（MIS-C）。阻止TGFβ可能为这种威胁生命的状况提供潜在的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/scientist-reveal-how-epstein-barr-virus-reactivation-triggers-mis-cin-cin-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/scientist-reveal-how-epstein-barr-virus-reactivation-triggers-triggers-mis-c-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1607211-936b-4e82-9d82-d82-dbf27d456c60 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 18:52:00 -0400 Scientists reveal how Epstein-Barr virus reactivation triggers MIS-C in children
肠道健康如何塑造心脏病的风险以及您能做什么一项新的评论强调了肠道微生物组失衡如何通过改变短链脂肪酸，TMAO和炎症途径来导致心血管疾病。该研究强调了益生元，益生菌和饮食变化的潜力，以恢复肠道健康并降低心脏病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/how-gut-health-shapes-disease-disease-risk-e28094-an--and-what-whit-what-what-what--what-you-you-can-do-do-about-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/How-gut-health-shapes-heart-disease-risk-e28094-and-what-you-can-do-about-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f03CA4A6-0BB3-4208-B3EF-A0239333D1A49 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 18:15:00 -0400 How gut health shapes heart disease risk — and what you can do about it
靶向马可增强癌症免疫疗法的有效性来自莫菲特癌症中心的研究人员通过靶向具有胶原结构或Marco的称为巨噬细胞受体的蛋白质来提高癌症免疫疗法的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/targeting-marco-enhances-cancer-cancer-immunotherapy-effectives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/targeting-marco-enhances-cancer-cancer-immunotherapy-effectime.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffa9d1c0-3d7e-4286-82C8-87887877EF98FE2 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 15:26:37 -0400 Targeting MARCO enhances cancer immunotherapy effectiveness
社会联系在疾病预防实践中起关键作用一项新的研究显示，人们的社会联系在确定他们是否采取预防性健康措施中起着至关重要的作用，这些措施可以帮助减少诸如疟疾等疾病的传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/social-connections-play-key-nect--------------in-in-disease-prevention-practices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/social-connections-play-key-play-key-reole-in-disease-prevention-prevention-practices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AA36DC05-3EA4-476D-476D-AD5D-894B5E2541E2 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 15:11:00 -0400 Social connections play key role in disease prevention practices

联合免疫疗法改善了头颈癌的治疗反应进行了针对头颈鳞状细胞癌（HNSCC）患者进行免疫疗法药物临床试验的研究人员发现，与仅接受一种免疫疗法药物的患者相比，患者对两种免疫疗法的组合的反应更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/combination-combination-mmmunotherapy-improves-mproves-wareatment-restment-response-fors-for-head-head-and-neck-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/combination-combination-mmmunotherapy-improves-mproves-wareatment-respons-fors-for-head-head-head-neck-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4b67​​96a-7fcd-4192-B81A-A41C6661BD257 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 14:45:52 -0400 Combination immunotherapy improves treatment response for head and neck cancer
